files.name: .gitignore
files.content:
# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# C extensions
*.so

# Distribution / packaging
.Python
env/
build/
develop-eggs/
dist/
downloads/
eggs/
.eggs/
lib/
lib64/
parts/
sdist/
var/
wheels/
*.egg-info/
.installed.cfg
*.egg

# PyInstaller
#  Usually these files are written by a python script from a template
#  before PyInstaller builds the exe, so as to inject date/other infos into it.
*.manifest
*.spec

# Installer logs
pip-log.txt
pip-delete-this-directory.txt

# Unit test / coverage reports
htmlcov/
.tox/
.coverage
.coverage.*
.cache
nosetests.xml
coverage.xml
*.cover
.hypothesis/

# Translations
*.mo
*.pot

# Django stuff:
*.log
local_settings.py

# Flask stuff:
instance/
.webassets-cache

# Scrapy stuff:
.scrapy

# Sphinx documentation
docs/_build/

# PyBuilder
target/

# Jupyter Notebook
.ipynb_checkpoints

# pyenv
.python-version

# celery beat schedule file
celerybeat-schedule

# SageMath parsed files
*.sage.py

# dotenv
.env

# virtualenv
.venv
venv/
ENV/

# Spyder project settings
.spyderproject
.spyproject

# Rope project settings
.ropeproject

# mkdocs documentation
/site

# mypy
.mypy_cache/

# etc
#*.bat
call cmd.bat

files.name: README.md
files.content:
[![GitHub release](https://img.shields.io/github/release/KurtBestor/Hitomi-Downloader.svg?logo=github)](https://github.com/KurtBestor/Hitomi-Downloader/releases/latest) [![GitHub downloads](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/KurtBestor/Hitomi-Downloader/latest/total.svg?logo=github)](https://github.com/KurtBestor/Hitomi-Downloader/releases/latest) [![GitHub downloads](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/KurtBestor/Hitomi-Downloader/total.svg?logo=github)](https://github.com/KurtBestor/Hitomi-Downloader/releases) ## Links - [Download](https://github.com/KurtBestor/Hitomi-Downloader/releases/latest) - [Issues](https://github.com/KurtBestor/Hitomi-Downloader/issues) - [Scripts & Plugins](https://github.com/KurtBestor/Hitomi-Downloader/wiki/Scripts-&-Plugins) - [Chrome Extension](https://github.com/KurtBestor/Hitomi-Downloader/wiki/Chrome-Extension) ## Demo ## Features - üç∞ Simple and clear user interface - üöÄ Download acceleration - üíª Supports 24 threads in a single task - üö• Supports speed limit - üìú Supports user scripts - üß≤ Supports BitTorrent & Magnet - üéûÔ∏è Supports M3U8 & MPD format videos - üåô Dark mode - üß≥ Portable - üìã Clipboard monitor - üóÉÔ∏è Easy to organize tasks ## Supported Sites | Site | URL | | :--: | -- | | **4chan** | | | **AfreecaTV** | | | **ArtStation** | | | **baraag.net** | | | **bilibili** | | | **ComicWalker** | | | **Coub** | | | **DeviantArt** | | | **Facebook** | | | **FC2 Video** | | | **Flickr** | | | **Hameln** | | | **Imgur** | | | **Instagram** | | | **„Ç´„ÇØ„É®„É†** | | | **Mastodon** | | | **Misskey** | | | **Naver Blog** | | | **Naver Cafe** | | | **Naver Post** | | | **Naver Webtoon** | | | **Naver TV** | | | **Niconico** | | | **Pawoo** | | | **Pinterest** | | | **Pixiv** | | | **pixiv„Ç≥„Éü„ÉÉ„ÇØ** | | | **Soundcloud** | | | **Â∞èË™¨ÂÆ∂„Å´„Å™„Çç„ÅÜ** | | | **TikTok** |
| | **Tumblr** | | | **Twitch** | | | **Twitter** | | | **Vimeo** | | | **Wayback Machine** | | | **Weibo** | | | **WikiArt** | | | **Youku** | | | **YouTube** | | | **and more...** | [Supported sites by yt-dlp](https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/blob/master/supportedsites.md) |

files.name: push_^q^.bat
files.content:
@echo off

git add .
git commit -m "^q^"
git push

echo Done!
pause>nul
